Quest Log

Quests

Active / Recurring Objectives

  • Stabilize post-Fair Day fallout after Billowbarrow collapse
  • Track slavery and hostage movements between bullywug/kobold groups
  • Resolve Vallaki/Wachterhaus political and cult crisis
  • Recover and secure major relics tied to Maerlyn/Prim
  • Pursue Old Young Kenjamin rescue priorities and party alignment

Open Threads

  • Status of missing captives and Billy's sister references
  • Strategic risk from Strahd-aligned forces and vampire spawn
  • Ongoing implications of forbidden industrial magic

See sessions for detail: Session Notes Index.
